INTERNATIONAL BEAUTY

World Class Beauty,
Canadian Heart

While our name is International Beauty, our roots run deep in Canadian soil. For over four decades, we've remained proudly 100% Canadian-owned and operated—a commitment that shapes everything we do.

Experience & Operation

A Canadian Legacy

Over 44 years of partnering with Canadian salon professionals, the company has expanded to a sales force of over 20 and 12 store locations from Manitoba to British Columbia, serving salons and stylists coast to coast.

Doris Tan The Synerfusion 83 Hair and Fashion Show

1981

Doris Tan launches International Beauty in Edmonton.

Hand-written invoices & trunk deliveries.

Local supplier.

Today

12 showroom locations, 8 education centres, 90 + staff serving Western Canada.

Click-to-cart ordering, live inventory, free shipping $600+.

Regional curator of 25 + elite global brands.

International Beauty Today

Canadian Owners Graham Kenny & Leigh Tait

Since 2015, dedicated to growth for salon professionals. Strengthening the Canadian economy.

What You Get & Why It Matters

Why Salons Choose International Beauty

Real Relationships

−

We're neighbours, Our local presence means you're working with people who understand your business and can provide personalized support.

Responsive Canadian Support

+

Our customer support team is based in Canada, ensuring quick response times and culturally relevant assistance.

Local Investment

+

We believe in reinvesting in our community. Supporting International Beauty means supporting Canadian businesses and local jobs.

Education Mindset

+

Our focus on education ensures that you and your team stay ahead of industry trends and techniques through workshops, seminars, and training sessions.

Long-Term Stability

+

We're committed to being a trusted partner for the long haul, providing consistent, reliable service and products year after year.

Education & Expert Support

Offering Continuous Education to Canadian Stylists

Grow Revenue, Not Hours

Learn the proven playbooks that raise prices, fill chairs, and build a team that runs itself.

Master Your Craft

Level up cutting, colouring, and styling skills in immersive, hands-on sessions you can use behind the chair tomorrow.

Network with Top Professionals

Connect and learn alongside industry peers, mentors, and experts.

Your Clients Expect More

Clients are demanding the latest styles. Learn the skills you need today to exceed their expectations tomorrow.

Future-Proof Your Palette

Be first to work with tomorrow's hues and placement trends—before they flood social feeds.

Elevate Your Client Experience

Learn techniques and tips that help you consistently deliver exceptional results.

VIEW EDUCATION & EVENTS

All About

Connections

International Beauty's
Social Event

We bring together professional hairstylists, local vendors, and top brands, followed by a series of workshops offered at an additional cost to beauty professionals, designed to help Canadian stylists strengthen their skills.

Reasons to Attend

Network with Top Brands

This event is an unique opportunity to network, learn, and support each other in the professional beauty community.

View Live Demonstrations

This social event is designed to foster community, and features live demos and product education.

Eat, Drink, Shop!

This event offers exclusive shopping on new and current brands, and local Canadian vendors. We also offer great food and drinks!

Ready to Elevate Your Salon?

Let's grow Canadian beauty, together!

REGISTER NOW

Call us, visit one of our 12 locations, or register for the next All About Connections event.
